requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290, equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
